snippet: The brother-in-law of an adviser to President Hamid Karzai was killed in a raid by Afghan commandos and American advisers, adding to growing tensions in the region.
abstract: Khiraullah Janan, brother-in-law of adviser to Afghanistan's Pres Hamid Karzai, is killed in raid by Afghan commandos and American advisers, adding to growing tensions.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Azam Ahmed reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: The brother-in-law of an adviser to President Hamid Karzai was killed in a raid by Afghan commandos and American advisers, adding to growing tensions in the region.

headline.seo: Death of Khiraullah Janan, Related to Karzai Adviser, Adds to Tensions With Afghan Military
headline.main: Man With Ties to Karzai Dies in a Military Raid
headline.print_headline: Man With Ties to Karzai Dies in a Military Raid
